category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_user_object_class
preference.preference_description: Defines the LDAP object class that the customer uses to model users to be synchronized with Teamcenter. If you use multiple classes that all represent users, then this preference should specify the common base class of those classes. Valid values: Accepts a single string. Must be the name of an LDAP object class.
